titleStmt.title: Americans no Iewes, or improbabilities that the Americans are of that race. By Hamon l'Estrange, Kt.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Hamon, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.W. for Henry Seile over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob. 5."; The "2" in the imprint date is crossed out and date altered to 1651.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Henry Seile over against St. Dunstans Church
